nodes.bodyText: Since this is a hardcoded sample value, Can't we use a pre-formatted value hardcoded here, Otherwise adding a new dependency just for formatting this is not worth it, isn't it?

I initially had a pre-formatted value here. But since we are using sql formatter to format the siddhi query received from the GET custom policy request I used that same formatter to format this text as well. This dependency is not only used to format this text its used to format the siddhi query received from the GET policy call as well.
Since siddhi is not 100% equal to SQL, this formatter could fail with some siddhi queries don't we need to handle such situations ?
